user.title: Connect to Apex
user.description: Enter your Apex host/IP and credentials. **admin** is recommended because it's commonly preconfigured, but it's not required. If you also use the Apex local web UI, use a dedicated account for Home Assistant (sharing the same account between multiple local logins can cause issues). If you set up more than one local integration/HA instance against the same controller, use separate Apex accounts.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Apex
reauth_confirm.description: Update credentials for {host}. Tip: use a dedicated Apex account for Home Assistant (avoid sharing an account with the local web UI or other local integrations).

abort.already_configured: This Apex controller is already configured. Credentials were updated and the entry will reload.
